Posts.Content: May 11, 2011 03:19PM DivaMimi wrote: Best of luck tomorrow Stella and on your upcoming wedding.  I know exactly how you are feeling.  I have a bilateral diagnostic mammogram next Thursday for a 'nodular density' that was found on my most recent mammo.  I think I may resort to the wine and SATC as well.  Sounds like a plan to me!  I was re-married just 2 months ago so now my new husband is having to face this ordeal with me and I've been quite snappy at him which I usually very even tempered and I know it is the stress related to this unknown issue.  Keep us all posted and we are keeping you in our thoughts and sending up prayers.
